title: 0xc0000005 error
body: I couldn't play league due to the 0xc0000005 error. Everything is fine but after champion selection the 0xc0000005 error window pop up. i am stuck there and couldn't get into the loading screen. Please help me to fix it.

replies.body:
Hey there,

Do you run lolreplay/lolrecorder? If so, please remove these as they are known to cause issues with the game.

If removing this software doesn't help could you please try [performing a clean boot](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes#wq7) and let me know if that resolves your issue.
Try upgrading to Windows 10. It worked for me when I did. But I reverted it, thinking it be normal.

I am having the exact same problem. I've youtubed and googled athousand solutions. Nothing works. Ran it through admin and did the RAD- delete rename method. Updated everything and nada. pain in the ass. It happened yesterday mronign and still the same.
